name: Hey Jude
author: Marcos Rezende

sections.description:
This is not just a plugin, it symbolizes the love from a father to his son. When activated you will randomly see a lyric from Hey Jude in the upper right of your admin screen on every page. This plugins is based on Hello, Dolly, a plugin developed by Matt Mullenweg.

This plugin is dedicated to Artur Trajano dos Santos Rezende, my first son that I will always carry in my heart.
